headline: HII Debuts GRIMM Spectrum Dominance Solution at AOC 2025 International Symposium & Convention
summary: McLEAN, Va., Dec. 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) announced today that its Mission Technologies division has deployed and operationalized a next-generation high-performance spectrum dominance solution, now available for rapid detection and location of hostile communications, radar and other electronic threats. HII will showcase its GRIMM® technology — and its field-proven capabilities in situational awareness, intelligence support and force protection — at the Association of Old Cro

headline: Huntington Ingalls (HII): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q3 Earnings?
summary: Over the past six months, Huntington Ingalls has been a great trade, beating the S&P 500 by 18.9%. Its stock price has climbed to $303.49, representing a healthy 33.1% increase. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.
